solution_line_template: In the car dealership with {total_cars} cars, {hybrid_percentage}*{total_cars} = <<{hybrid_percentage}*{total_cars}={hybrid_cars}>>{hybrid_cars} hybrid cars.
Out of the {hybrid_cars} hybrid cars, {one_headlight_percentage}*{hybrid_cars} = <<{one_headlight_percentage}*{hybrid_cars}={cars_with_one_headlight}>>{cars_with_one_headlight} cars.
The total number of hybrid cars with full headlights is {hybrid_cars}-{cars_with_one_headlight}=<<{hybrid_cars}-{cars_with_one_headlight}={cars_with_full_headlights}>>{cars_with_full_headlights}
